"Speeder": "Good to see ya, pal! I'm Speeder, a training instructor."
"Gah... Hear me out, will ya? Lately I've noticed that ARKs have been lackin' in the running department, see?"
"So there's this machine that'll have you runnin' until your legs feel like they're made outta pure Photon."
"Whassat? You ain't heard of it? Bah, you should be fine goin' in blind."

"What I'm sayin' is, I wanna see you runnin' with that machine. で、マシーンを使ったお前さんの走りを、
ちょっくら見せてほしいってコトよ。"
"Oh... Aight. That's too bad, I was hopin' I'd get to see how you run."
"Hey you! How ya doin'? Stayin' active, yeah?"
"“フィールドレース”について"
"“フィールドレース：走破”について"
